Package bt.torrent.fileselector

Class TorrentFileSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.torrent.fileselector.TorrentFileSelector

  • public abstract class TorrentFileSelector
extends Object
    Provides API for file selection (aka partial downloads). Currently there's a limitation that empty files will always be created (even if they weren't selected).
    Since:
    1.7

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TorrentFileSelector​()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected abstract SelectionResult select​(TorrentFile file)
      Make a decision on whether to download or skip the given file.
      List<SelectionResult> selectFiles​(List<TorrentFile> files)
      Returns a list of decisions on whether to download or skip each of the given files, in the same order.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Returns a list of decisions on whether to download or skip each of the given files, in the same order.
